titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Poster Collection Documenting Yale
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig and staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:03

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The collection consists of posters that document all aspects of Yale student and community life including clubs, organizations, film societies, concerts, lectures, theater, class announcements, commencements, and reunions.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 48-A (YRG 48-A), Yale pictorial records and collections.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Poster Collection Documenting Yale (RU 185). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of posters that document all aspects of Yale student and community life including clubs, organizations, film societies, concerts, lectures, theater, class announcements, commencements, and reunions.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The posters are arranged alphabetically by subject and by subsequent accessions.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: "Iconoclast" poster gift of David Alan Richards, 2013. Indian Neck Folk Music Festival posters gift of Mrs. Celeste Hemingson, 2013.
